features: Weatherproof from start to finish with a water resistant zipper and truck tarp inner liner, this resilient bag securely stores your essentials for a trail ride or a cross-town commute
The Mini Bike Bag is a must-have for anyone who wants a little more from their ride
Water repellent exterior nylon and waterproof truck tarp liner for easy cleaning
Hook & loop 2-strap attachment system to handlebars
Oversized coated YKK zipper and water resistant zipper track
Water repellent exterior nylon and waterproof truck tarp liner for easy cleaning
Hook & loop 2-strap attachment system to handlebars
Main compartment fits small tools, a spare tube, sunglasses or an extra snack
Oversized coated YKK zipper and water resistant zipper track
Materials: 210D nylon ripstop, 10oz vinyl tarp liner
